title: Patriots stock watch: Here’s who stood out and struggled in Super Bowl loss to Seahawks
author: Khari A. Thompson
bullets: Christian Gonzalez and Craig Woodson stood out for the Patriots defense, despite their 29-13 Super Bowl loss.
The Patriots' offensive line struggled against Seattle's defense, affecting quarterback Drake Maye's performance.
Seattle's Kenneth Walker III excelled, earning Super Bowl MVP, while Patriots' offensive issues persisted.

title: What an emotional Drake Maye said of Super Bowl LX loss
author: Conor Ryan
bullets: Drake Maye expressed regret over missed opportunities following Patriots' 29-13 Super Bowl LX loss to the Seattle Seahawks.
The Patriots’ offensive line struggled, allowing six sacks and contributing to Maye's three turnovers in the second half.
Despite the loss, Maye praised his teammates and looks forward to the offseason with optimism for the 2026 season.

title: Super Bowl 2026: Bad Bunny performs joyful, controversy-free halftime show
author: Kevin Slane
bullets: Bad Bunny performed at Super Bowl 60 halftime show with guest appearances by Lady Gaga and Ricky Martin.
The 13-minute performance was an homage to Latin culture, featuring hits like 'Tití Me Preguntó' and 'Yo Perreo Sola'.
Despite conservative criticism, the show emphasized unity, ending with a message of love displayed on the Jumbotron.

title: Super Bowl celebrities: Here’s who was spotted in Santa Clara
author: Samantha Genzer
bullets: Jay-Z, Blue Ivy, and Lady Gaga attended Super Bowl LX at Levi's Stadium in Santa Clara on Feb. 8, 2026.
Bad Bunny performed at the halftime show joined by Cardi B, Karol G, and Lady Gaga.
Celebrities such as Peyton Manning, Tom Brady, Robert Downey Jr., and Ricky Martin were spotted at the event.

title: Mass. State Police report fake account impersonating trooper
author: Molly Farrar
bullets: Massachusetts State Police warn about a fake social media account impersonating a female state trooper.
The account "Sarita" has over 100,000 followers and includes images of a fake trooper in various locations.
The impersonator also appears to mimic a Santa Monica officer, with both accounts linking to adult content on OnlyFans.

title: In Patriots territory, Seahawks fans find a home base for the Super Bowl
author: Samantha Genzer
bullets: Alma Cantina and White Bull Tavern in Boston hosted a dedicated watch party for Seattle Seahawks fans during Super Bowl LX.
The restaurants were a designated gathering spot for the Boston Seahawks Fan group, originally started by Brenna Stuart.
The watch party offered Seahawks fans a community experience, contrasting the typical Patriots-dominated Super Bowl scene in Boston.

title: Watch: Patriots’ Stefon Diggs shoved to the ground as punches fly during sideline scuffle
author: Khari A. Thompson
bullets: Patriots' Stefon Diggs was shoved by Seattle's Josh Jobe during a sideline altercation; no penalties or ejections followed.
Josh Jobe appeared to punch at Diggs during the scuffle; Mack Hollins and Kayshon Boutte intervened to separate them.
Stefon Diggs is facing assault and strangulation charges from a December incident; his arraignment is on February 13.

title: Green Line service suspended between Park Street and Government Center after train derails
author: Carson Lyle
bullets: Green Line service between Park Street and Government Center is suspended due to a train derailment at Park Street station.
MBTA announced the derailment suspension at 2:46 p.m.; the train was rerailed by 6:43 p.m., but service remains down.
MBTA advises using the Orange Line as they inspect and repair Park Street's platform following the derailment.

title: ‘Good Will Dunkin’: Watch Ben Affleck, Tom Brady, Jennifer Aniston, and more in 2026 Super Bowl commercial
author: Kevin Slane
bullets: Ben Affleck stars in a Dunkin' Super Bowl ad parodying 'Good Will Hunting' with '90s sitcom stars.
Tom Brady, Jennifer Aniston, and Matt LeBlanc appear in 'Good Will Dunkin' during Super Bowl LX.
The ad features sitcom setups with Affleck's character working at Dunkin', including humorous cameos from Ted Danson and Jason Alexander.

title: Here’s Ann Michael Maye’s custom look for Super Bowl Sunday
author: Samantha Genzer
bullets: Ann Michael Maye supported her husband, Patriots QB Drake Maye, at Super Bowl LX in custom Patriots attire.
Her outfit, featuring a cropped jacket and studded jeans, was designed by Kristin Juszczyk, wife of 49ers player Kyle Juszczyk.
Ann Michael Maye gained popularity in 2025 for her social media presence and viral baking videos in the Boston area.
